content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

In a state of emergency visits to prisons, remand prisons, and security detention facilities are prohibited. The ban is compensated by extending a possibility to have a call for 30 minutes per day. Also, prisoners are allowed to have a videocalls with their loved ones.

Lawyers can go to prisons on behalf of clients. However, they must face masks in all of the areas of the facility, including dealings with the client. Lawyers can also communicate with clients online using the "Skype Defense" program.
